thread.title: Bristol fire: how it could affect your commute
thread.title_full: Bristol fire: how it could affect your commute | West Country (E) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Bristol fire: how it could affect your commute
text:
Firefighters remain on the scene in Colston Street, Bristol, dealing with the fire in student accomodation.
Although the exact cause is unknown, initial calls to the Avon Fire & Rescue Service Control room suggest it started in a kitchen.
A number of students have been displaced and are being rehoused by the University of Bristol and Bristol City Council.
Motorists and pedestrians are advised to avoid the area during the rush hour while firefighting operations continue:
Avon Fire & Rescue @AvonFireRescue Follow Here's the latest on the fire in Colston Street, Bristol. We're asking people to avoid the area during rush hour http://t.co/vkur4nMlpb
15:13 - 12 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Avon Fire & Rescue @AvonFireRescue Follow Crews will remain on the scene in Colston Street, Bristol, for several hours. Motorists asked to avoid the area http://t.co/vkur4nMlpb
